## Last Verse
<!--Put a short poem you created using chatGPT of 20 to 30 lines,here!-->

Her melodies, like whispers in the night,   
Unveiling stories hidden from plain sight,    
A songstress of allure and vintage charm,   
Her essence resonates, a soothing balm.   

With languid grace, she paints a vivid scene,   
A kaleidoscope of emotions in between,    
Her words like brushstrokes on a canvas vast,   
Weaving tales of love, heartbreak, and the past.    

From the streets of New York to Hollywood's glitz,    
She bares her soul, each lyric a heartfelt blitz,   
A tragic beauty, a reflection of our desires,   
In her songs, we find solace from the world's fires.    

Her voice, a velvet veil of tender sorrow,    
An invitation to dwell in dreams borrowed,    
She sings of summers lost and endless nights,   
A haunting lullaby, where darkness ignites.   

With vintage glamour and cinematic flair,   
She captures moments in her soulful lair,   
Her music, a journey to another time,   
Where old Hollywood whispers in every rhyme.
